steps.name: Test
steps.run: CGO_ENABLED=1 gotestsum --junitfile tmp/test-results/test.xml --raw-command -- go test -json -tags=sources $(go list ./... | grep -v /vendor/ | grep -v pkg/detectors | grep -v pkg/sources)

steps.name: Upload test results to BuildPulse for flaky test detection
